titleStmt.title: The fyrst chapitre is the lyf of saint ierom as it is take of legenda aurea The seconde is of his lyf also as saint austyn wryteth in hys pystill The thyrd is how saint Jerome apperid to sai[nt] Austin in grete ioye ...
Vita
titleStmt.author: Winter, Simon, d. 1448.

notesStmt.note: By Simon Winter, of Syon Abbey.
Imprint from STC; date of publication conjectured by STC.
Printer's device on D5v, final leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
